text: Dr Penny Lo is a very caring sincere doctor. Although I am also put off by the impolite manners of the front counter staffs, having a good honest professional doctor is far more important to me.

"Wait la, the doctor is still writing!" The reply given when I asked if my turn was next and one of the 3 receps looked up from her phone, and said "Yes, after this."
"After this" meaning...? The patient had exited a couple of minutes ago. So I mentioned that and that rude reply given by another recep - a more senior one maybe?
"Why was I so impatient? Can't I wait for my name to be called?" - that was the implied message beneath it.
Was she unhappy with her life, her job? We are patients to the clinic, ill and waited for 2hours to see the doctor. I don't think a polite reply is difficult to be uttered. Or a simple "We will call your name when the doctor is ready to see you."
Last visit to this clinic. They won't miss me since they're always busy but just to inform future/potential patients.

Dr Penny Lo is a friendly and caring person.  I saw her  on 20/04/24 as I am above the age of 65 in order to renew my driving license  as required by the  Singapore Police Force  I need to get a doctor to certify that I am fit for driving. . She examined my body carefully and meticulously. She is very conscientious and I am deeply impressed by her attitude and service. She is one of the best family doctor that I ever met.
Good doctor and staff but the appointment system just doesnâ€™t work here. Booked an appointment for vaccination and still had to wait over an hour just like a walk-in patient.
As usually one of my trusted clinic. Dr penny was superb and friendly.
